price: They said, “We heard a young man, speaking ill of them, who is called Abraham.”
arabic: قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا فَتٗى يَذۡكُرُهُمۡ يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
